channel.title: babaji on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in babaji on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Babaji
item.description: 23:48 Monday 03 October 2016 JST A man who is apparently self-realized is staying at Paola’s house until Friday. Feel free to come by and have a chat if you like. I plan to go again on Wednesday, and I may go again tomorrow. Tonight was chanting with people from Hare Krishna something something. It wasn’t bad, despite what I’ve learned from media to think about Hare Krishna followers.
